headline: A Fresh Look at Netflix (NFLX) Valuation as Live Sports and New Features Fuel Growth Momentum
summary: Netflix (NFLX) just made waves with the announcement of its partnership with Joe Hand Promotions to stream the Canelo Alvarez vs. Terence "Bud" Crawford boxing showdown to bars, restaurants, and other commercial venues across North America. As the streaming giant leans deeper into live sports, this move is the latest in a string of events where major bouts have made their way to communal screens via Netflix’s expanding network. It is another datapoint for investors tracking how new revenue...
